results.name: Neighbor in 1-2 direction of numbers arranged as clockwise spiral.
link: Peter Kagey, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Frank Ellermann, Some EIS sequences based on a spiral of natural numbers.
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers.
example: For example, if the spiral is oriented such that 1 is immediately to the right of 2, as shown below, then a(2) = 11 because 11 is immediately to the right of 2.
xref: Cf. A054552 (middle row right), A054567 (middle row left).
results.author: _Frank Ellermann_, Feb 22 2002
